sen.e: After sixty years from the war, going through second generations, seeing religion as not from the point of view to categorize into dual, existing Bukkyo and new religion, although there is search for the direction is continued, it is presumed that the religious group of 真如苑 seems to direct a certain direction or possibility where 'Bulky' should go to go along with new generation.
